nf:register.nf:name: rx_queue_num_pkts_in_queue
nf:register.nf:description: Number of packets in the RX queue (current)

nf:register.nf:name: rx_queue_num_pkts_enqueued
nf:register.nf:description: Number of packets enqueued (stored) to RX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: rx_queue_num_pkts_dropped_bad
nf:register.nf:description: Number of packets dropped due to invalid marking (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: rx_queue_num_pkts_dequeued
nf:register.nf:description: Number of packets dequeued (removed) from RX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: rx_queue_num_underruns
nf:register.nf:description: Number of underruns of the RX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: rx_queue_num_overruns
nf:register.nf:description: Number of overruns of the RX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: rx_queue_num_words_pushed
nf:register.nf:description: Number of words pushed out of the RX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: rx_queue_num_bytes_pushed
nf:register.nf:description: Number of bytes pushed out of the RX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: tx_queue_num_pkts_in_queue
nf:register.nf:description: Number of packets in the TX queue (current)

nf:register.nf:name: tx_queue_num_pkts_enqueued
nf:register.nf:description: Number of packets enqueued (stored) to the TX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: tx_queue_num_pkts_dequeued
nf:register.nf:description: Number of packets dequeued (sent) from the TX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: tx_queue_num_underruns
nf:register.nf:description: Number of underruns of the TX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: tx_queue_num_overruns
nf:register.nf:description: Number of overruns of the TX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: tx_queue_num_words_pushed
nf:register.nf:description: Number of words pushed out of the TX queue (cumulative)

nf:register.nf:name: tx_queue_num_bytes_pushed
nf:register.nf:description: Number of bytes pushed out of the TX queue (cumulative)
